title: France panorama. [No. 72/41]
creator_credit: Gaumont-British Instructional and Societe d'informations Cinematographiques
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. In the news: Urban renovation - Paris’ 13th District goes modern. Horizon 80 - round table on future management prospects. 2. The auto show: engines - a new production unit in northern France. French manufacturers - the 1972/73 production of France’s main trademarks. 3. The arts - the Reims Cathedral and the Tau Museum.
